comprehensive_overview: AnnotationDbi is an R package providing a common interface to easily access and manipulate annotations in various formats for genomic data analysis. It enables researchers to retrieve and manage annotation data from various sources to enhance the interpretation of genomic data.
core_features: Access and manipulate annotation data for genomic analysis
Support for various annotation formats and sources
Integration with other Bioconductor packages for comprehensive genomic analysis
Efficient data retrieval and manipulation functions for large datasets
